member.name: AndEquals1
member.summary: Checks if this element is AND equaled to all of the parameters.
member.returns: if value is AND equaled to all of the parameters. EX: a == b and a == c and a == d.

member.name: NAndEquals1
member.summary: Checks if this element is NAND equaled to all of the parameters.
member.returns: if value is NAND equaled to all of the parameters. EX: !(!(a == b and a == c) and a == d).

member.name: NOrEquals1
member.summary: Checks if this element is NOR equaled to all of the parameters.
member.returns: if value is NOR equaled to all of the parameters. EX: !(!(a == b or a == c) or a == d).

member.name: OrEquals1
member.summary: Checks if this element is OR equaled to all of the parameters.
member.returns: if value is OR equaled to any of the parameters. EX: a == b or a == c or a == d.

member.name: XNOrEquals1
member.summary: Checks if this element is XNOR equaled to all of the parameters.
member.returns: if value is XNOR equaled to any of the parameters. EX: !(!(a == b ^ a == c) ^ a == d).

member.name: XOrEquals1
member.summary: Checks if this element is XOR equaled to all of the parameters.
member.returns: if value is XOR equaled to all of the parameters. EX: a == b ^ a == c ^ a == d.
